vanced.changelog:
07-06-2023

Patches: 2.175.0
  [2.175.0] 
 Bug Fixes
- settings: sort setting preferences using lowercase  
- spoof-wifi-connection: use updated instruction indices  
- youtube/downloads: rename patch to external-downloads  
- youtube/hide-info-cards: fix hide-info-cards setting does not work  
- youtube/hide-player-buttons: fix previous/next button showing if previous video exists  
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: clarify settings switch  
- youtube/integrations: fix playback of embedded videos  
- youtube/remember-video-quality: fix typo in video resolutions  
- youtube/remove-player-controls-background: use correct patch name and description 
- youtube/theme: use dynamic background color for custom splash screen  
 Features
- nfctoolsse: add unlock-pro patch  
- remove-screen-capture-restriction: remove app constraint  
- scbeasy: add remove-debugging-detection patch  
- tiktok: remove compatibility version constraints  
- youtube/general-ads: merge hide-get-premium patch into general-ads patch 
- youtube/hide-seekbar: more fine grained hiding of seekbar  
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: hide channel bar & sound button 
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: hide shorts info panel  
- youtube/navigation-buttons: use a better preference screen title 

 
Integrations:   [0.109.0] 
 Bug Fixes
- youtube/downloads: rename patch to external-downloads  
- youtube/hide-player-buttons: fix previous/next button showing if previous video exists  
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: hide new type of Shorts in feed 
 Features
- remove-screen-capture-restriction: remove app constraint  
- youtube/hide-ads: hide new type of ad 
- youtube/hide-seekbar: more fine grained hiding of seekbar  
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: hide channel bar & sound button 
- youtube/hide-shorts-components: hide shorts info panel  

 
CLI:   [2.22.0] 
 Features
- rip-lib and unsigned 
 

YouTube version: 18.19.35
